/********************************************************************************************************
	1.1 Update the raw tables with the current day's data, pulled from the data warehouse.
********************************************************************************************************/

	DECLARE @DeleteTableStatement NVARCHAR(MAX)
	DECLARE Cur2 CURSOR READ_ONLY
	FOR
			SELECT  'Delete from [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']  where stamp <> (select distinct max(stamp) from [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + '])'
			FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
			WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RAW'
					AND TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_NAME like 'RAW.P.%'


	OPEN Cur2
	FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		  BEGIN
				PRINT 'Executing ' + @DeleteTableStatement
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @DeleteTableStatement
				FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
		  END
	CLOSE Cur2
	DEALLOCATE Cur2

/***************************************************
Drop list of dates*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[RAW].[DateList]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [RAW].[DateList]

/***************************************************
Declare variables to produce list of dates*/

-- prevent set or regional settings from interfering with 
-- interpretation of dates / literals
SET DATEFIRST  1, -- 1 = Monday, 7 = Sunday
    DATEFORMAT mdy, 
    LANGUAGE   BRITISH;
-- assume the above is here in all subsequent code blocks.

--DECLARE @StartDate  date = '20190101';

--DECLARE @CutoffDate date = DATEADD(DAY, -1, DATEADD(YEAR, 4, @StartDate));

DECLARE @StartDate  date = '20181211';

DECLARE @CutoffDate date =	(
								SELECT	MAX([Date])
								FROM	(
											SELECT CAST([Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Argus Pricing]
											UNION ALL
											SELECT CAST([Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters MGO Pricing]
											UNION ALL
											SELECT CAST([Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
										)d
							);

/***************************************************
Create list of dates and insert into table*/

;WITH seq(n) AS 
(
  SELECT 0 UNION ALL SELECT n + 1 FROM seq
  WHERE n < DATEDIFF(DAY, @StartDate, @CutoffDate)
),
d([Date]) AS 
(
  SELECT DATEADD(DAY, n, @StartDate) FROM seq
)
SELECT [Date] 
INTO [RAW].[DateList]
FROM d
ORDER BY [Date]
OPTION (MAXRECURSION 0);

--1461

/***************************************************
Join Pricing table to DateList on a 1=1 basis*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing]

SELECT * 
INTO [Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing]
FROM [RAW].[DateList]
LEFT JOIN  (SELECT DISTINCT	CAST([Description] AS NVARCHAR(250)) AS [Description]
							,[Contract/Delivery]
							,[Time Stamp]
							,[Price Type]
							,[Currency/Unit]
							,[Delivery Mode]
							,[Fill Type]	
							, 'Argus' AS [Source]		
			FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Argus Pricing]) REF
ON 1=1

UNION ALL

SELECT		dl.[Date] AS [Date]
,			[Description] AS [Description]
,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
,			[Price Type] 
,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
,			'' AS [Fill Type]
,			'Reuters' AS [Source]
FROM		[RAW].[DateList] dl
LEFT JOIN	(
				SELECT		DISTINCT CAST([Description] AS NVARCHAR(250)) AS [Description]
				,			[Price Type]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters MGO Pricing]
			) mgo
ON			1=1

UNION ALL

SELECT		dl.[Date] AS [Date]
,			[Description] AS [Description]
,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
,			[Price Type] 
,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
,			'' AS [Fill Type]
,			'Reuters' AS [Source]
FROM		[RAW].[DateList] dl
LEFT JOIN	(
				SELECT		DISTINCT CAST([Description] AS NVARCHAR(250)) AS [Description]
				,			[Price Type]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
				WHERE		[Description] NOT LIKE 'EUR%'
				AND			[Date] IS NOT NULL
			) rp
ON			1=1

--33603

/***************************************************
Simplify fuel price descriptions*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]

SELECT DISTINCT 
		PJ.*,
--		PJ.[Description] + '_' + PJ.[Price Type] AS [DescPT],
--		CASE 
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel Palm OME RED ARA range barge fob'										THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price1'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel FAME 0C CFPP RED ARA range barge fob'									THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price2'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel palm oil mill effluent RED Malaysia/Indonesia fob'						THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price3'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel Rapeseed OME RED ARA range barge fob'									THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price4'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel tallow OME RED ARA range barge fob'										THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price5'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'UCO (used cooking oil) cif ARA USD/t'												THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price6'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'UCO (used cooking oil) fob China'													THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price7'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel UCOME (used cooking oil) RED ARA range barge fob'						THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price8'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'HVO (hydrotreated vegetable oil) fob ARA range (Class I) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price9'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'HVO (hydrotreated vegetable oil) fob ARA range (Class II) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price10'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'HVO (hydrotreated vegetable oil) fob ARA range (Class III) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price11'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Palm oil futures Bursa Malaysia month'												THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price12'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Rapeseed oil fob Dutch Mill RSO'													THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price13'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'SAF (sustainable aviation fuel) fob ARA range (Class II) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price14'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Tallow (categories 1 & 2) fca northwest Europe EUR/t'								THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price15'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Freight PME Malaysia - ARA 3-5kt'													THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price16'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'UCO (used cooking oil) RED bulk China fob'											THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price17'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Gasoil NWE 7-28 day swaps'															THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price18'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Soybean oil Argentina waterborne fob upriver USD/t month'							THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price19'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo'--high				THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price20'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo'--low					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price21'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel SME Argentina waterborne fob upriver'									THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price22'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel UCOME (used cooking oil) RED bulk China fob'								THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price23'
--		ELSE 'ERROR' END AS [Description ID],
		AP.[Value]
--		ISNULL(AP.[value],LAG(AP.[value],33602,-999) OVER(ORDER BY PJ.[description], PJ.[Date] ASC))  AS [Filled Value]
--		LAST_VALUE(AP.[value]) OVER( ORDER BY PJ.[description],  pj.[date] ASC) AS [LASTVALUE]
INTO [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
FROM [Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing] PJ
LEFT JOIN	(
				SELECT		DISTINCT [Date]
				,			[Description]
				,			[Contract/Delivery]
				,			[Time Stamp]
				,			[Price Type] 
				,			[Currency/Unit]
				,			[Delivery Mode]
				,			[Fill Type]
				,			[Value]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Argus Pricing]

				UNION ALL

				SELECT		DISTINCT [Date] AS [Date]
				,			[Description] AS [Description]
				,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
				,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
				,			[Price Type] 
				,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
				,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
				,			'' AS [Fill Type]
				,			[Value] AS [Value]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters MGO Pricing]

				UNION ALL	

				SELECT		DISTINCT [Date] --AS [Date]
				,			[Description] --AS [Description]
				,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
				,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
				,			[Price Type] 
				,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
				,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
				,			'' AS [Fill Type]
				,			[Value] AS [Value]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
				WHERE		[Description] NOT LIKE 'EUR%'
				AND			[Date] IS NOT NULL
			) AP
ON	PJ.[Date]				= AP.[Date]
AND	PJ.[description]		= AP.[Description]
AND	PJ.[Contract/Delivery]	= AP.[Contract/Delivery]
AND	PJ.[Time Stamp]			= AP.[Time Stamp]
AND	PJ.[Price Type]			= AP.[Price Type]
AND	PJ.[Currency/Unit]		= AP.[Currency/Unit]
AND	PJ.[Delivery Mode]		= AP.[Delivery Mode]
AND	PJ.[Fill Type]			= AP.[Fill Type]

--36126

/***************************************************
Average Price Table Calculation*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing]

SELECT * 
INTO [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing] 
FROM [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
WHERE [Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo'

--2922

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing]

SELECT
		[Date],
		AVG(CAST([Value] AS FLOAT)) AS [AVG_Value]
INTO [Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing]
FROM [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing]
GROUP BY [Date]
ORDER BY [Date]

--1461

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]

SELECT DISTINCT
		AP.[Date],
		AP.[Description],
		AP.[Contract/Delivery],
		AP.[Time Stamp],
		'high low avg' AS [Price Type],
		AP.[Currency/Unit],
		AP.[Delivery Mode],
		AP.[Fill Type],
		AP.[Source],
		AV.[AVG_Value] AS [Value]
INTO [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]
FROM [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing] AP
LEFT JOIN [Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing] AV
ON AV.[Date] = AP.[Date]

--1461

/***************************************************
Addition Price Table Calculation*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing]

SELECT * 
INTO [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing] 
FROM [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
WHERE [Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo' 
OR [Description] = 'Soybean oil Argentina waterborne fob upriver USD/t month'

--4014


IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing]

SELECT	[Date]
,		CASE WHEN [Null Flag] > 0 THEN NULL
			ELSE NULLIF((SUM(CAST(CASE WHEN [Description] LIKE 'Biofuel%' THEN '0' ELSE [Value] END AS FLOAT)) 
					+ SUM(CAST(CASE WHEN [Description] LIKE 'Soybean%' THEN '0' ELSE [Value] END AS FLOAT))/2),0)
			END AS [SUM_Value]
INTO [Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing]
FROM		(
				SELECT	*
				,		SUM(CASE WHEN [Value] IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY [Date])	 AS [Null Flag]								
				FROM [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing]
			) sap
GROUP BY [Date]
,		[Null Flag]
ORDER BY [Date]
		
--1461

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]

SELECT DISTINCT
		AP.[Date],
		'Soybean oil Argentina waterborne fob upriver USD/t month' AS [Description],
		'' AS [Contract/Delivery],
		AP.[Time Stamp],
		'midpoint_calc' AS [Price Type],
		AP.[Currency/Unit],
		AP.[Delivery Mode],
		AP.[Fill Type],
		AP.[Source],
		AD.[SUM_Value] AS [Value]
INTO [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]
FROM [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing] AP
LEFT JOIN [Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing] AD
ON AD.[Date] = AP.[Date]


/***************************************************
Join all pre partition*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]

SELECT *
INTO [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]
FROM [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]


--36525

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]

SELECT
		*,
		CASE WHEN [Source] = 'Argus' THEN [Description]+'_'+[Price Type] ELSE [Description] END AS [Full Description]
INTO [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]
FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]

--36525


/***************************************************
Loop to create description ID's*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[DescID]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[DescID]

CREATE TABLE [Core].[DescID]
([Description] NVARCHAR(128), [ID] NVARCHAR(32))

DECLARE @counter INT
DECLARE @maxcount INT
DECLARE @description NVARCHAR(128)
SET @maxcount = (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT [Full Description]) FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition])
SET @counter = 1
DECLARE clicker CURSOR FOR

SELECT DISTINCT [Full Description] FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]

OPEN clicker
FETCH NEXT FROM clicker INTO @description

WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 AND @maxcount >= @counter
BEGIN
		INSERT INTO [Core].[DescID]
		VALUES (@description,@counter)
		SET @counter = @counter + 1
		FETCH NEXT FROM clicker INTO @description
END

CLOSE clicker
DEALLOCATE clicker


/***************************************************
Join ID's to main table*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]

SELECT	PP.*,
		ID.[ID]
INTO [Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]
FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition] PP
LEFT JOIN [Core].[DescID] ID
ON ID.[Description] = PP.[Full Description]
ORDER BY [Full Description],[Date]

--36525


/***************************************************
Fills down any missing prices using first value*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[FixedArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[FixedArgusPricing]

SELECT DISTINCT
		*, 
		FIRST_VALUE([Value]) OVER (PARTITION BY ID.ID, ID.[Value_Partition] ORDER BY ID.[ID], [Date]) AS [NewValue]
INTO [Core].[FixedArgusPricing]
FROM   (SELECT
			*,
			SUM(CASE WHEN [Value] IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY [ID], [Date]) AS [Value_Partition]
		FROM [Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]
		) AS ID
ORDER BY [ID], [Date] ASC

--38,802

--the bottom of the script aligns to point 2.6 in tom stews data marks script all be it with some neatening up to do most likely.


/***************************************************
Join fuel lookup data and FX rates*/

		IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[Pricing]','U') IS NOT NULL
			DROP TABLE [Trade].[Pricing]

		SELECT		fap.[Date]
		,			IIF(fap.[Value] IS NULL,1,0)		AS [Filled Down Flag]
		,			fap.[Full Description]				AS [Attribute]
		,			fap.[NewValue]						AS [Original Value] 
		,			fl.[Category]
		,			fl.[Name]
		,			fl.[UOM]							AS [Original UOM]
		,			fl.[Transport Cost]
		,			fl.[Transport UOM]
		,			fl.[Yield Assumption]
		,			fx.[EUR:USD] as [FX Rates.Eur:USD] 
		,			CASE WHEN fl.[UOM] = 'USD/t'			THEN fap.[NewValue]/fx.[EUR:USD]	ELSE fap.[NewValue] END AS [Value EUR]
		,			CASE WHEN fl.[Transport UOM] = 'USD'	THEN fl.[Transport Cost]/fx.[EUR:USD]	ELSE CASE WHEN fl.[Transport Cost] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE fl.[Transport Cost] END END AS [Transport Cost EUR]
		,			'€/mt' AS [UOM]
		INTO		[Trade].[Pricing]
		FROM		[Core].[FixedArgusPricing] fap
		LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT *
						FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Fuel Lookup]
					) fl
		ON			fap.[Description] = fl.[Description]
		AND			fap.[Price Type] = CASE WHEN fl.[Name] = 'SBO fob Argentina' THEN 'midpoint_calc' ELSE fl.[Price Type] END
		LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		[Date]	AS [Date]
						,			CASE WHEN [EUR:USD] IS NOT NULL THEN [EUR:USD] ELSE MAX([EUR:USD]) OVER (PARTITION BY [RowGroup] ORDER BY [Date]) END AS [EUR:USD]
						FROM		(
										SELECT		dl.[Date]
										,			CAST(rp.[Date] AS DATE) AS [RP Date]
										,			CAST([Value] AS DECIMAL(28,8)) AS [EUR:USD]
										,			COUNT(rp.[Date]) OVER (ORDER BY dl.[Date]) AS [RowGroup]
										FROM		[RAW].[DateList] dl
										LEFT JOIN	(
														SELECT		DISTINCT *
														FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
														WHERE		[Description] LIKE 'EUR=%'
													) rp
										ON			dl.[Date] = CAST(rp.[Date] AS DATE)
									) rg
					) fx
		ON			fx.[Date] = fap.[Date]
		WHERE		fap.[NewValue] IS NOT NULL

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 3.1:	Create a table linking sales invoices to sales contracts.
********************************************************************************************************/	

	IF OBJECT_ID('[SupplyChain].[SalesInvoicesAndContractNumber]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [SupplyChain].[SalesInvoicesAndContractNumber]

	SELECT		sc.[Sales Contract Number]
	,			soi.[Order Number]
    ,			soi.[Parent Order]
    ,			soi.[Invoice Price]
    ,			soi.[Invoiced Quantity]
    ,			soi.[Transactional Currency Code]
    ,			soi.[Business Unit Name]
    ,			soi.[Transaction Date]
    ,			soi.[Invoice Amount]
    ,			soi.[EUR:GBP]
    ,			soi.[EUR:USD]
    ,			soi.[Sold To Party ID]
    ,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[SupplyChain].[SalesInvoicesAndContractNumber]
	FROM		Finance.SalesOrdersAndInvoices soi
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Agreement Header ID]
					,			[Order Number]
					FROM		Core.[SalesOrders]
					WHERE		[Submitted Flag] = 'Y'
				) so
	ON			soi.[Order Number] = so.[Order Number]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Sales Contract Number]
					,			[Contract Header ID]
					FROM		Core.SalesContracts
				) sc
	ON			sc.[Contract Header ID] = so.[Agreement Header ID]
	ORDER BY	[Transaction Date]


 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 3.2:	Create a table linking purchase invoices to purchase contracts.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[SupplyChain].[PurchaseInvoicesAndContractNumber]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [SupplyChain].[PurchaseInvoicesAndContractNumber]

	SELECT		pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
	,			poi.[Order Number]
    ,			poi.[Parent Order]
    ,			poi.[Supplier/Customer]
    ,			poi.[Supplier/Customer Number]
    ,			poi.[Agreement Number/Sales Contract Number]
    ,			poi.[Item Code]
    ,			poi.[Item Description]
    ,			poi.[Category Code]
    ,			poi.[UOM Code]
    ,			poi.[Agreement Price]
    ,			poi.Quantity
    ,			poi.[Invoice Price]
    ,			poi.[Invoiced Quantity]
    ,			poi.[Invoice Line Amount]
    ,			poi.Currency
    ,			poi.[Business Unit]
    ,			poi.[Inventory Organization Code]
    ,			poi.[Inventory Organization Name]
    ,			poi.[Ordered Quantity]
    ,			poi.[Approval Status]
    ,			poi.[Mode of Transport]
    ,			poi.[Freight Terms]
    ,			poi.[Invoice Number]
    ,			poi.[Order Status]
    ,			poi.[Transaction Date]
    ,			poi.[Invoice Amount]
    ,			poi.[EUR USD]
    ,			poi.[EUR GBP]
    ,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[SupplyChain].[PurchaseInvoicesAndContractNumber]
	FROM		[Finance].[PurchaseOrdersAndinvoices] poi 
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
					,			[PO Header ID]
					,			[PO Line ID]
					FROM		Core.PurchaseContracts
				) pc
	ON			poi.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	AND			poi.[From Line ID] = pc.[PO Line ID]
	WHERE		[poi].[Business Unit] NOT IN ('ROTIE BU','Quatra BU')

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 5.1:	Combine shipping files
********************************************************************************************************/	


	IF OBJECT_ID('[SupplyChain].[Shipping]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [SupplyChain].[Shipping]
	
	SELECT		ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY [Country]) AS [Index]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [File] = 'UK22'
						THEN 0
					WHEN [x].[BL date] IS NULL
						THEN 0
					WHEN CAST(ISNULL([x].[BL date],CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) AS DATE) < CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND ([x].[ATA Date] > CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) OR [x].[ATA Date] IS NULL)
						THEN 1
					ELSE 0
				END AS [Live Shipment Indicator]
	,			*
	INTO		[SupplyChain].[Shipping]
	FROM		(

					SELECT		'UK'			AS [Country]
					,			[Product]
					,			CASE
									WHEN [BL date] = '02-05 Aug'
										THEN '2023-08-05'
									WHEN [BL date] = '02-04 Aug'
										THEN '2023-08-04'
									WHEN [BL date] = '27-30 Jun'
										THEN '2023-07-30'
									WHEN [BL date] LIKE '%as%'
										THEN CONCAT('2023-',RIGHT(REPLACE([BL date],'as ',''),2),'-',LEFT(REPLACE([BL date],'as ',''),2))
									ELSE [BL date]
								END AS [BL date]
					,			[Port of load/disch]			AS [Planned Port]
					,			CAST(CASE
										WHEN [Planned] IS NULL
											THEN NULL
										WHEN TRY_CAST([Planned] AS DATE) IS NOT NULL
											THEN [Planned]
										WHEN Planned = 'end Sep-begin Oct'
											THEN '2023-09-30'
										WHEN [Planned] LIKE 'end%'
											THEN CAST(CAST(CONCAT('30 ',RIGHT([Planned],LEN([Planned])-CHARINDEX('-',[Planned],1)),' 2023') AS DATE) AS NVARCHAR(255))
										ELSE CAST(CAST(REPLACE(CONCAT(RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Planned],'April','Apr'),'17-Mar','17 Mar'),' Port Klang',''),' Ams',''),6),' 2023'),'  ',' ') AS DATE) AS NVARCHAR(255))
									END AS DATE)	AS [Planned Date]
					,			CASE
									WHEN [ATA Stanlow] IS NULL OR [ATA Stanlow] LIKE '%Vasto%' OR [ATA Stanlow] LIKE '%Port Klang%' OR [ATA Stanlow] LIKE 'SBLC'
										THEN NULL
									WHEN TRY_CAST([ATA Stanlow] AS DATE) IS NOT NULL
										THEN [ATA Stanlow]
									ELSE CAST(CAST(REPLACE(CONCAT(RIGHT([ATA Stanlow],6),' 2023'),'  ','') AS DATE) AS NVARCHAR(255))
								END	AS [ATA Date]
					,			[Vessel]
					,			[Vessel IMO]
					,			[mothervessel]
					,			[Mothervessel IMO]
					,			[x] AS [Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[Customer]
					,			[L/D]
					,			[Tonnage]		
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Oracle Contract nr.],'+','/'))) AS [Oracle Contract nr.]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'+','/'),' ->) ','/'),'(','')))  AS [Oracle Order nr.]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'+','/'))) AS [Self-procurement orders]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Transport  orders],'+','/'))) AS [Transport orders]
					,			'UK23' AS [File]
					FROM		[RAW].[SC.Shipping2023UK]
					WHERE		[Product] IS NOT NULL
					AND			[Product] <> 'Product'


					UNION ALL

					SELECT		'UK' AS [Country]
					,			[Product]
					,			[BL date]
					,			[Port of loading] AS [Planned Port]
					,			CAST(CASE
										WHEN [Planned] = 'Amsterdam' OR [Planned] IS NULL
											THEN NULL
										WHEN TRY_CAST([Planned] AS DATE) IS NOT NULL
											THEN [Planned]
										ELSE CAST(CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONCAT(RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Planned],'Rdam',''),'Rtm ',''),' Ams',''),'Rtd',''),'Ams ',''),'Sept','Sep'),6),' 2022'),'  ',' '),'-',' ') AS DATE) AS NVARCHAR(255))
									END AS DATE) AS [Planned Date]
					,			NULLIF([ATA],'Amsterdam') AS [ATA Date]
					,			[Vessel]
					,			'' AS [Vessel IMO]
					,			[mothervessel]
					,			'' AS [Mothervessel IMO]
					,			'' AS [Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[Customer]
					,			[L/D]
					,			[Tonnage]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Oracle Contract nr.],'+','/'))) AS [Oracle Contract nr.]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'+','/'))) AS [Oracle Order nr.]	
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'+','/'))) AS [Self-procurement orders]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Transport orders],'+','/'))) AS [Transport orders]
					,			'UK22' AS [File]
					FROM		[RAW].[SC.Shipping2022UK]
					WHERE		[Product] IS NOT NULL

					UNION ALL

					SELECT		'NL' AS [Country]
					,			[Product]
					,			CASE
									WHEN [BL date] LIKE '%blend%'
										THEN NULL
									ELSE REPLACE(REPLACE([BL date],'week 42-43','2023-10-22'),'week 43','2023-10-22') 
								END AS [BL date] 
					,			[Port of load/disch] AS [Planned Port]
					,			CAST(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CASE
											WHEN TRY_CAST([Planned] AS DATE) IS NOT NULL
												THEN [Planned]
											WHEN [Planned] LIKE 'end%'
												THEN CAST(CAST(CONCAT('30 ',RIGHT([Planned],LEN([Planned])-CHARINDEX('-',REPLACE([Planned],'end ','end-'),1)),' ',ISNULL([Year],'2023')) AS DATE) AS NVARCHAR(255))
											ELSE CONCAT(RIGHT(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Planned],'2-3','3'),'mid','15'),' Stanlow',''),'April ->',''),'Sept','Sep'),'Maart','Mar'),' Rdam',''),' Rtd',''),'Savona ',''),' Ams',''),'June','Jun'),6),' ',ISNULL(CASE WHEN [Year] = '#VALUE!' THEN '2022' WHEN [Year] = '#REF!' THEN '2023' WHEN [Year] = 'Barge' THEN '2023' ELSE [Year] END,'2023'))
										END,'-5 ','05'),'-6','06'),'-7 ','07') AS DATE) AS [Planned Date]
					,			[ATA Ams] AS [ATA Date]
					,			[Vessel]
					,			'' AS [Vessel IMO]
					,			'' AS [mothervessel]
					,			'' AS [Mothervessel IMO]
					,			'' AS [Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[Customer]
					,			[L/D]
					,			[Tonnage]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([Contract],'+','/'))) AS [Oracle Contract nr.]
					,			LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(REPLACE([Order],'4 8','4/8'),'+','/')))  AS [Oracle Order nr.]	
					,			CASE
									WHEN [T or Self-procument] LIKE '%T'
										THEN NULL
									ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([T or Self-procument],'+','/')))
								END AS [Self-procurement orders]
					,			CASE
									WHEN [T or Self-procument] LIKE '%T'
										THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE([T or Self-procument],'+','/')))
									ELSE NULL
								END AS [Transport orders]
					,			'NL' AS [File]
					FROM		[RAW].[SC.ShippingNL]
					WHERE		[Product] IS NOT NULL
					AND			[Product] <> 'Product'
			) x
	WHERE	[Product] <> 'Product'

 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 5.2:	Separate order numbers.
********************************************************************************************************/	
	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ShippingSeparatedContractsAndOrders/','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE #ShippingSeparatedContractsAndOrders
	
	SELECT		[s].[Index]
	,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
	,			[Country]
	,			[Product]
	,			[BL Date]
	,			[Planned Port]
	,			[Planned Date]
	,			[ATA Date]
	,			[Vessel]
	,			[s].[mothervessel]
	,			[Vessel IMO]
	,			[s].[mothervessel IMO]
	,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
	,			[Customer]
	,			[L/D]
	,			[Tonnage]
	,			[Oracle Contract nr.]
	,			[Oracle Order nr.]
	,			[Self-procurement orders]
	,			[Transport orders]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Oracle Order nr.] NOT LIKE '%/%'
						THEN [Oracle Order nr.]
					ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],1,[OrderSeparatorIndex1]),'/','')))
				END AS [Order1]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] = 2
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex1],LEN([Oracle Order nr.])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] > 2
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex1],[OrderSeparatorIndex2]-[OrderSeparatorIndex1]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [Order2]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] = 3
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex2],LEN([Oracle Order nr.])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] > 3
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex2],[OrderSeparatorIndex3]-[OrderSeparatorIndex2]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [Order3]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] = 4
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex3],LEN([Oracle Order nr.])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] > 4
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex3],[OrderSeparatorIndex4]-[OrderSeparatorIndex3]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [Order4]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOfOrders] = 5
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Oracle Order nr.],[OrderSeparatorIndex4],LEN([Oracle Order nr.])),'/','')))
				END AS [Order5]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Self-procurement orders] NOT LIKE '%/%'
						THEN [Self-procurement orders]
					ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],1,[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex1]),'/','')))
				END AS [SP_Order1]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] = 2
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex1],LEN([Self-procurement orders])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] > 2
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex1],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex2]-[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex1]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [SP_Order2]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] = 3
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex2],LEN([Self-procurement orders])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] > 3
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex2],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex3]-[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex2]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [SP_Order3]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] = 4
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex3],LEN([Self-procurement orders])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] > 4
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex3],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex4]-[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex3]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [SP_Order4]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_SP_Orders] = 5
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Self-procurement orders],[SP_OrderSeparatorIndex4],LEN([Self-procurement orders])),'/','')))
				END AS [SP_Order5]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Transport orders] NOT LIKE '%/%'
						THEN [Transport orders]
					ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],1,[T_OrderSeparatorIndex1]),'/','')))
				END AS [T_Order1]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] = 2
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex1],LEN([Transport orders])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] > 2
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex1],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex2]-[T_OrderSeparatorIndex1]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [T_Order2]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] = 3
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex2],LEN([Transport orders])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] > 3
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex2],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex3]-[T_OrderSeparatorIndex2]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [T_Order3]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] = 4
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex3],LEN([Transport orders])),'/','')))
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] > 4
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex3],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex4]-[T_OrderSeparatorIndex3]),'/','')))
					ELSE NULL
				END AS [T_Order4]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [NumberOf_T_Orders] = 5
						THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REPLACE(SUBSTRING([Transport orders],[T_OrderSeparatorIndex4],LEN([Transport orders])),'/','')))
				END AS [T_Order5]
	INTO		#ShippingSeparatedContractsAndOrders
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			LEN([Oracle Order nr.]) - LEN(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'/','')) + 1 AS [NumberOfOrders]
					,			LEN([Oracle Order nr.]) - LEN(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'/','')) AS [NumberOfOrderSeparators]
					,			CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],1) AS [OrderSeparatorIndex1]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Oracle Order nr.]) - LEN(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'/','')) > 1
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.])+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [OrderSeparatorIndex2]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Oracle Order nr.]) - LEN(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'/','')) > 2
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.])+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [OrderSeparatorIndex3]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Oracle Order nr.]) - LEN(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'/','')) > 3
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.])+1)+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [OrderSeparatorIndex4]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Oracle Order nr.]) - LEN(REPLACE([Oracle Order nr.],'/','')) > 4
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.],CHARINDEX('/',[Oracle Order nr.])+1)+1)+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [OrderSeparatorIndex5]
					,			LEN([Self-procurement orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'/','')) + 1 AS [NumberOf_SP_Orders]
					,			LEN([Self-procurement orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'/','')) AS [NumberOf_SP_OrderSeparators]
					,			CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],1) AS [SP_OrderSeparatorIndex1]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Self-procurement orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'/','')) > 1
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders])+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [SP_OrderSeparatorIndex2]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Self-procurement orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'/','')) > 2
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders])+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [SP_OrderSeparatorIndex3]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Self-procurement orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'/','')) > 3
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders])+1)+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [SP_OrderSeparatorIndex4]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Self-procurement orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Self-procurement orders],'/','')) > 4
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Self-procurement orders])+1)+1)+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [SP_OrderSeparatorIndex5]
					,			LEN([Transport orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Transport orders],'/','')) + 1 AS [NumberOf_T_Orders]
					,			LEN([Transport orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Transport orders],'/','')) AS [NumberOf_T_OrderSeparators]
					,			CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],1) AS [T_OrderSeparatorIndex1]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Transport orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Transport orders],'/','')) > 1
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders])+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [T_OrderSeparatorIndex2]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Transport orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Transport orders],'/','')) > 2
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders])+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [T_OrderSeparatorIndex3]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Transport orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Transport orders],'/','')) > 3
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders])+1)+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [T_OrderSeparatorIndex4]
					,			CASE
									WHEN LEN([Transport orders]) - LEN(REPLACE([Transport orders],'/','')) > 4
										THEN CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders],CHARINDEX('/',[Transport orders])+1)+1)+1)+1)
									ELSE 0
								END AS [T_OrderSeparatorIndex5]
					FROM		SupplyChain.Shipping 
				) s

	UNION ALL

	SELECT		[Index]
	,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
	,			[Country]
	,			[Product]
	,			[BL Date]
	,			[Planned Port]
	,			[Planned Date]
	,			[ATA Date]
	,			[Vessel]
	,			[mothervessel]
	,			[Vessel IMO]
	,			[mothervessel IMO]
	,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
	,			[Customer]
	,			[L/D]
	,			[Tonnage]
	,			[Oracle Contract nr.]
	,			[Oracle Order nr.]
	,			NULL AS [Self-procurement orders]
	,			NULL AS [Transport orders]
	,			NULL AS [Order1]
	,			NULL AS [Order2]
	,			NULL AS [Order3]
	,			NULL AS [Order4]
	,			NULL AS [Order5]
	,			NULL AS [SP_Order1]
	,			NULL AS [SP_Order2]
	,			NULL AS [SP_Order3]
	,			NULL AS [SP_Order4]
	,			NULL AS [SP_Order5]
	,			NULL AS [T_Order1]
	,			NULL AS [T_Order2]
	,			NULL AS [T_Order3]
	,			NULL AS [T_Order4]
	,			NULL AS [T_Order5]
	FROM		SupplyChain.Shipping
	WHERE		[Oracle Order nr.] IS NULL

 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 5.3:	Unpivot data to create list of order numbers per shipping index.
********************************************************************************************************/

	SELECT		*
	INTO		#ShippingOrdersUnpivot
	FROM		(
					SELECT		[b].[Index]
					,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
					,			[b].[Country]
					,			[b].[BL date]
					,			[b].[Planned Port]
					,			[b].[Planned Date]
					,			[b].[ATA Date]
					,			[b].[Vessel]
					,			[b].[mothervessel]
					,			[Vessel IMO]
					,			[Mothervessel IMO]
					,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[b].[Product]
					,			[b].[Oracle Contract nr.]
					,			[b].[Oracle Order nr.]
					,			[b].[Customer]
					,			[b].[L/D]
					,			[b].[Tonnage]
					,			REPLACE([Order Number],'SO','') AS [Order Number]
					,			'Standard' AS [Order Type] 
					FROM		#ShippingSeparatedContractsAndOrders a
					UNPIVOT		([Order Number] FOR [Order] IN ([Order1],[Order2],[Order3],[Order4],[Order5])) b
					
					UNION ALL

					SELECT		[b].[Index]
					,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
					,			[b].[Country]
					,			[b].[BL date]
					,			[b].[Planned Port]
					,			[b].[Planned Date]
					,			[b].[ATA Date]
					,			[b].[Vessel]
					,			[b].[mothervessel]
					,			[Vessel IMO]
					,			[Mothervessel IMO]
					,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[b].[Product]
					,			[b].[Oracle Contract nr.]
					,			[b].[Oracle Order nr.]
					,			[b].[Customer]
					,			[b].[L/D]
					,			[b].[Tonnage]
					,			REPLACE([b].[SP Order Number],'SO','') AS [Order Number]
					,			'Self-Procurement' AS [Order Type]
					FROM		#ShippingSeparatedContractsAndOrders
					UNPIVOT		([SP Order Number] FOR [S-P Order] IN([SP_Order1],[SP_Order2],[SP_Order3],[SP_Order4],[SP_Order5])) b

					UNION ALL

					SELECT		[b].[Index]
					,			[Live Shipment Indicator]
					,			[b].[Country]
					,			[b].[BL date]
					,			[b].[Planned Port]
					,			[b].[Planned Date]
					,			[b].[ATA Date]
					,			[b].[Vessel]
					,			[b].[mothervessel]
					,			[Vessel IMO]
					,			[Mothervessel IMO]
					,			[Vessel Transfer Indicator]
					,			[b].[Product]
					,			[b].[Oracle Contract nr.]
					,			[b].[Oracle Order nr.]
					,			[b].[Customer]
					,			[b].[L/D]
					,			[b].[Tonnage]
					,			REPLACE([b].[T Order Number],'SO','') AS [Order Number]
					,			'Transport' AS [Order Type]
					FROM		#ShippingSeparatedContractsAndOrders
					UNPIVOT		([T Order Number] FOR [T Order] IN([T_Order1],[T_Order2],[T_Order3],[T_Order4],[T_Order5])) b
				) u
	ORDER BY	[Index]

 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 5.4:	Create final shipping contracts table
********************************************************************************************************/	

IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.ShippingContracts','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE SupplyChain.ShippingContracts

	SELECT		u.*
	,			COALESCE(poi.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number],soi.[Sales Contract Number]) AS [Agreement/Sales Contract Number]
	,			COALESCE(poi.[Transaction Date],soi.[Transaction Date]) AS [Transaction Date]
	,			COALESCE(poi.[Total Invoiced Quantity],soi.[Total Invoiced Quantity]) AS [Total Invoiced Quantity]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL THEN 'Purchases'
					ELSE 'Sales'
				END AS [Sales/Purchase]
	,			poi.[Inventory Organization Code]
	,			poi.[Inventory Organization Name]
	,			poi.[Approval Status]
	,			poi.[Order Status]			
	,			COALESCE(poi.[Supplier/Customer Number],sc.[Customer Number]) AS [Supplier/Customer Number]
	,			COALESCE(pc.[Supplier Name],sc.[Customer]) AS [Supplier/Customer]		
	,			i.[Item Code]
	,			i.[Item Name]
	,			COALESCE(poi.[Mode of Transport],sc.[Shipping Method]) AS [Shipping Method]
	,			COALESCE(poi.[Business Unit],soi.[Business Unit Name],pc.[Business Unit Name],sc.[Business Unit Name]) AS [Business Unit Name]
	,			CAST(LEFT(so.[Request Ship Date],10) AS DATE) AS [Request Ship Date]
	,			CAST(LEFT(so.[Schedule Ship Date],10) AS DATE) AS [Schedule Ship Date]
	,			CAST(LEFT(po.[Requested Date],10) AS DATE) AS [Requested Date]
	,			CAST(LEFT([Pick up Date],10) AS DATE) AS [Pick Up Date]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN bu.[Country]
					ELSE COALESCE(l2.[Country],l3.[Country],l4.[Country])
				END AS [Ship To Country]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN bu.[City]
					ELSE COALESCE(l2.[City],L3.[City],l4.[City])
				END AS [Ship To City]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN bu.[Postal Code]
					ELSE COALESCE(l2.[Postal Code],l3.[Postal Code],l4.[Postal Code])
				END AS [Ship To Postal Code]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN bu.[Address]
					ELSE COALESCE(l2.[Address],l3.[Address],l4.[Address])
				END AS [Ship To Address]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN bu.[Business Unit Name]
					ELSE COALESCE(l2.[Company Name],l3.[Company Name],l4.[Company Name])
				END AS [Ship To Company]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN COALESCE(l1.[Country],l5.[Country])
					ELSE bu.[Country]
				END AS [Ship From Country]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN COALESCE(l1.[City],l5.[City])
					ELSE bu.[City]
				END AS [Ship From City]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN COALESCE(l1.[Postal Code],L5.[Postal Code])
					ELSE bu.[Postal Code]
				END AS [Ship From Postal Code]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN COALESCE(l1.[Address],NULLIF(REPLACE(CONCAT([l5].[Company Name],',',ISNULL([l5].[Address Line 2],''),',',ISNULL([l5].[Address Line 3],'')),',,',','),','))
					ELSE bu.[Address]
				END AS [Ship From Address]
	,			CASE
					WHEN TRY_CAST([u].[Order Number] AS FLOAT) IS NULL
						THEN COALESCE(l1.[Company Name],l5.[Company Name])
					ELSE bu.[Business Unit Name]	
				END AS [Ship From Company]
	INTO		SupplyChain.ShippingContracts
	FROM		#ShippingOrdersUnpivot u							
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
	ON			po.[Purchase Order Number] = u.[Order Number]		
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Order Number] 
					,			[Request Ship Date]
					,			[Submitted Flag]
					,			[Sold To Party ID]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			MAX([Schedule Ship Date]) AS [Schedule Ship Date]
					FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders]
					GROUP BY	[Order Number] 
					,			[Request Ship Date]
					,			[Submitted Flag]
					,			[Sold To Party ID]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
				) so
	ON			so.[Order Number] = u.[Order Number]
	AND			LEN(u.[Order Number]) <> 3			
	AND			so.[Submitted Flag] = 'Y'					
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [PO Header ID]
					,			[PO Line ID]
					,			[Ship From Location ID]
					,			[Deliver To Location ID]
					,			[Transaction Type]
					FROM		[Core].[ReceivingTransactions]
				) rt
	ON			po.[PO Header ID] = rt.[PO Header ID]
	AND			po.[PO Line ID] = rt.[PO Line ID]
	AND			rt.[Transaction Type] = 'RECEIVE'						
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER]
					,			[SHIP_FROM_LOCATION_ID]
					,			[SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID]
					FROM		[Core].[ShippingDetails]
				) sd
	ON			so.[Order Number] = sd.[SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER]
	AND			so.[Submitted Flag] = 'Y'								
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
					,			[Order Number]
					,			MIN([Transaction Date]) AS [Transaction Date]
					,			[Inventory Organization Code]
					,			[Inventory Organization Name]
					,			[Approval Status]
					,			[Order Status]			
					,			[Supplier/Customer Number]
					,			[Mode of Transport]
					,			[Business Unit]
					,			SUM(CAST([Invoiced Quantity] AS DECIMAL(28,4))) AS [Total Invoiced Quantity]
					FROM		SupplyChain.PurchaseInvoicesAndContractNumber
					WHERE		[Approval Status] <> 'CANCELLED'
					GROUP BY	[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
					,			[Order Number]
					,			[Inventory Organization Code]
					,			[Inventory Organization Name]
					,			[Approval Status]
					,			[Order Status]			
					,			[Supplier/Customer Number]
					,			[Mode of Transport]
					,			[Business Unit]
				) poi
	ON			po.[Purchase Order Number] = poi.[Order Number]	
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit Name]
					,			[Order Number]
					,			[Sales Contract Number]
					,			SUM([Invoiced Quantity]) AS [Total Invoiced Quantity]
					,			MIN([Transaction Date]) AS [Transaction Date]
					FROM		SupplyChain.SalesInvoicesAndContractNumber
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit Name]
					,			[Order Number]
					,			[Sales Contract Number]
				) soi
	ON			so.[Order Number] = soi.[Order Number]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Item Code]
					,			MAX([Item Name]) AS [Item Name] 
					FROM		Core.Items
					GROUP BY	[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Item Code]
				) i
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = COALESCE(po.[Item ID],so.[Inventory Item ID]) 
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Sales Contract Number]
					,			[Shipping Method]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					,			[Customer Ship To]
					,			[sc].[Customer]
					,			[sc].[Customer Number]
					FROM		[SupplyChain].[SalesContracts] sc
					WHERE		sc.[DateStamp] = (SELECT MAX([DateStamp]) FROM [SupplyChain].[SalesContracts])
				) sc
	ON			COALESCE(COALESCE(poi.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number],soi.[Sales Contract Number]),u.[Order Number]) = sc.[Sales Contract Number]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					,			REPLACE(CONCAT([Company Name],',',ISNULL([Address Line 2],''),',',ISNULL([Address Line 3],'')),',,',',') AS [Address]
					FROM		Core.Locations
				) l1
	ON			rt.[Ship From Location ID] = l1.[Location ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					,			REPLACE(CONCAT([Company Name],',',ISNULL([Address Line 2],''),',',ISNULL([Address Line 3],'')),',,',',') AS [Address]
					FROM		Core.Locations
				) l2
	ON			sd.[SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID] = l2.[Location ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit Name],
                                    [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number],
									[Supplier Name],
                                    DateStamp
						FROM		SupplyChain.PurchaseContracts
						WHERE		[DateStamp] = (SELECT MAX([DateStamp]) FROM [SupplyChain].PurchaseContracts)
				) pc
	ON			pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] = COALESCE(COALESCE(poi.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number],soi.[Sales Contract Number]),u.[Order Number])
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit Name]
					,			[Business Unit ID]
					,			o.[Party ID]
					,			p.[Location ID]
					,			l.[Country]
					,			l.[City]
					,			l.[Postal Code]
					,			l.[Company Name]
					,			REPLACE(CONCAT([l].[Company Name],',',ISNULL([l].[Address Line 2],''),',',ISNULL([l].[Address Line 3],'')),',,',',') AS [Address]
					FROM		Core.Organizations o
					LEFT JOIN	Core.Parties p
					ON			p.[Party ID] = o.[Party ID]
					LEFT JOIN	Core.Locations l
					ON			p.[Location ID] = l.[Location ID]
					WHERE		o.[Party ID] <> 'N/A'
				) bu
	ON			COALESCE(poi.[Business Unit],soi.[Business Unit Name],pc.[Business Unit Name],sc.[Business Unit Name]) = bu.[Business Unit Name]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			[Party Site Name]
					,			MIN(l.[Country]) AS [Country]
					,			MIN(l.[City]) AS [City]
					,			MIN(l.[Postal Code]) AS [Postal Code]
					,			MIN(l.[Company Name]) AS [Company Name]
					,			MIN(REPLACE(CONCAT([l].[Company Name],',',ISNULL([l].[Address Line 2],''),',',ISNULL([l].[Address Line 3],'')),',,',',')) AS [Address]
					FROM		Core.Parties p
					LEFT JOIN	Core.Locations l
					ON			p.[Location ID] = l.[Location ID]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
					,			[Party Site Name]
				) l3
	ON			so.[Sold To Party ID] = l3.[Party ID]
	AND			sc.[Customer Ship To] = l3.[Party Site Name]	
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			[Party Site Name]
					,			l.[Country]
					,			l.[City]
					,			l.[Postal Code]
					,			REPLACE(CONCAT([l].[Company Name],',',ISNULL([l].[Address Line 2],''),',',ISNULL([l].[Address Line 3],'')),',,',',') AS [Address]
					,			l.[Company Name]
					FROM		Core.Parties p
					LEFT JOIN	Core.Locations l
					ON			p.[Location ID] = l.[Location ID]
					WHERE		p.[Primary Party Site] = 'Y'
					AND			p.[Party Site Name] <> 'Do Not Use'
				) l4
	ON			so.[Sold To Party ID] = l4.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.Suppliers su
	ON			su.[Vendor ID] = po.[Supplier]
	AND			su.[Vendor SIte ID] = po.[Supplier Site]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.Locations l5
	ON			l5.[Location ID] = su.[Location ID]
	WHERE		[i].[Item Code] NOT LIKE 'SE%' OR [i].[Item Code] IS NULL
	ORDER BY	[Index], COALESCE(poi.[Transaction Date],soi.[Transaction Date])

-- Build purchase orders table
	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.PurchaseOrdersAndContracts','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE SupplyChain.PurchaseOrdersAndContracts

	SELECT		pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number],
                po.[PO Header ID],
                po.[Current Version ID],
                po.[Purchase Document Status],
                po.[Purchasing BU],
				o.[Business Unit Name] AS [Purchasing BU Name],
                po.Buyer,
                po.[Purchase Document Type],
                po.[Purchase Order Number],
                po.Supplier,
                po.[Supplier Site],
                po.[Terms ID],
                po.Incoterm,
                po.[Purchase Document Currency],
                po.[Agreement Start Date],
                po.[Agreement End Date],
                po.[Agreement Amount],
                po.[Amount Released Against Agreement],
                po.[Carrier ID],
                po.[Note To Vendor],
                po.[Bill To BU ID],
                po.[Sold To BU ID],
                po.[Req BU ID],
                po.[Ship To Location ID],
                po.[Bill To Location ID],
                po.[Purchased Document Closed Date],
                po.[Currency Conversion Rate],
                po.[Note To Receiver],
                po.[Purchase Document Description],
                po.[From Type Lookup Code],
                po.[Sustainability Position],
                po.[Deal Date],
                po.[Transporter Name],
                po.[Transporter Unit Price],
                po.[FFA Spec],
                po.[Transporter Amount],
                po.[Ultimo Order],
                po.[Transporter Currency],
                po.[Additional Charges 1 Supplier],
                po.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price],
                po.[Additional Charges 1 Amount],
                po.[Additional Charges 1 Currency],
                po.[Additional Charges 1 Description],
                po.[Additional Charges 2 Supplier],
                po.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price],
                po.[Additional Charges 2 Amount],
                po.[Additional Charges 2 Currency],
                po.[PO Line ID],
                po.[From Header ID],
                po.[Procurement BU ID],
                po.[Line Status],
                po.[Line Number],
                po.[Item ID],
                po.[Category ID],
                po.[Item Description],
                po.[UOM Code],
                po.[Unit Price],
				CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'EUR'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'GBP'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'USD'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)
				END AS [Unit Price EUR],
				CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'GBP'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'USD'
						THEN (CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END AS [Unit Price GBP],
				CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'USD'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'GBP'
						THEN (CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END AS [Unit Price USD],
                po.[Ordered Quantity],
                po.[From Line ID],
                po.[Supplier Item],
                po.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],
                po.[Closed Date],
                po.[Cancel Reason],
                po.[Requested Date],
                po.[Pick up Date],
                s.[Vendor ID],
                s.[Supplier ID],
                sn.[Party ID],
                sn.[Supplier Name],
                i.[Item Code],
                i.[Inventory Item ID],
                i.[Category Code],
                i.[Item Name],
                le.[Legal Entity ID],
                le.[Legal Entity Name],
				p.[Shipping Method],
				fx.[EUR USD],
				fx.[EUR GBP],
				CAST([po].[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST([po].[Ordered Quantity] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount],
				CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'GBP'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'USD'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)
					ELSE '0'
				END * CAST(ISNULL([po].[Ordered Quantity],0) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount EUR],
				CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'GBP'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'USD'
						THEN (CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(ISNULL(fx.[EUR GBP],0) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END * CAST(ISNULL([po].[Ordered Quantity],0) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount GBP],
				CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'USD'
						THEN po.[Unit Price]
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN po.[Purchase Document Currency] = 'GBP'
						THEN (CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END * CAST(ISNULL([po].[Ordered Quantity],0) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount USD],
				CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		SupplyChain.PurchaseOrdersAndContracts
	FROM		Core.PurchaseOrders po
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
					,			[PO Header ID]
					,			[PO Line ID]
					FROM		Core.PurchaseContracts
				) pc
	ON			po.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	AND			po.[From Line ID] = pc.[PO Line ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Suppliers] s
	ON			po.[Supplier] = s.[Vendor ID]
	AND			po.[Supplier Site] = s.[Vendor Site ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID] 
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Supplier Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) sn
	ON			s.[Party ID] = sn.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			po.[Purchasing BU] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
					,			MIN([Item Name])	AS [Item Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Items]
					GROUP BY	[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i 
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = po.[Item ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Legal Entity ID]
					,			[Legal Entity Name]
					FROM		Core.Organizations
				) le
	ON			PO.[Sold To BU ID] = le.[Legal Entity ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Shipping Method]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) p
	ON			po.[Carrier ID] = p.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.FXRates fx
	ON			CAST(LEFT([po].[Requested Date],10) AS DATE) = CAST(fx.[CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE)
	WHERE		pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] NOT IN (
																	SELECT		DISTINCT [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
																	FROM		[Core].[PurchaseContracts]
																	WHERE		[Amount Released Against Agreement] = 0
																	AND			[Agreement End Date] < '2021-07-01'
															   ) 	


-- Build sales orders table

					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)

				CASE
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD'
						THEN (CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END AS [Unit Price GBP],
				CASE
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP'
						THEN (CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END AS [Unit Price USD],
                so.[Reference Line ID],
                so.[Inventory Organization ID],
                so.[Display Line Number],
                so.[Schedule Ship Date],
                so.[RMA Delivered Qty],
                so.[Canceled Qty],
                sc.[Sales Contract Number],
                sc.[Contract Header ID],
				sc.[Shipping Method],
                c.[Party ID],
                c.[Customer Number],
                c.Customer,
                o.[Business Unit ID],
                o.[Business Unit Name],
                i.[Organization ID],
                i.[Item Code],
                i.[Item Name],
                i.[Category Code],
				fx.[EUR USD],
				fx.[EUR GBP],
				CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST([so].[Ordered Qty] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount],
				CASE
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0)
					ELSE '0'
				END * CAST([so].[Ordered Qty] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount EUR],
				CASE
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD'
						THEN (CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(ISNULL(fx.[EUR GBP],0) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END * CAST([so].[Ordered Qty] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount GBP],
				CASE
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'EUR'
						THEN CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4)) * CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
					WHEN so.[Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP'
						THEN (CAST(CAST(so.[Unit Selling Price] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))/NULLIF(CAST(fx.[EUR GBP] AS DECIMAL(28,4)),0))*CAST(fx.[EUR USD] AS DECIMAL(28,4))
				END * CAST([so].[Ordered Qty] AS DECIMAL(28,4)) AS [Amount USD],
				CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		SupplyChain.SalesOrdersAndContracts
	FROM		Core.SalesOrders so
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Sales Contract Number]
					,			[Contract Header ID]
					,			[Sales Contract Version]
					,			[Shipping Method]
					FROM		Core.SalesContracts	
				) sc
	ON			sc.[Contract Header ID] = so.[Agreement Header ID]
	AND			sc.[Sales Contract Version] = so.[Agreement Version Number]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			[Party Number]		AS [Customer Number]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Customer]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
					,			[Party Number]
				) c
	ON			so.[Sold To Party ID] = c.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			so.[Org ID] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Organization ID]
					,			[Item Code]
					,			[Item Name]
					,			[Category Code]
					FROM		[Core].[Items] 
					GROUP BY	[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Organization ID]
					,			[Item Code]
					,			[Item Name]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = so.[Inventory Item ID]
	AND			so.[Inventory Organization ID] = i.[Organization ID]
	LEFT JOIN	Core.FXRates fx
	ON			[so].[Ordered Date] = CAST([fx].[CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE)


-- Third Party Inventory
	IF OBJECT_ID('SupplyChain.TSA_ThirdPartyInventory','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE SupplyChain.TSA_ThirdPartyInventory

	SELECT		*
	INTO		SupplyChain.TSA_ThirdPartyInventory
	FROM		[Core].[OnHandBalance] ohb
	WHERE		[Business Unit Name] IN ('ROTIE BU','Quatra BU')
